New Records: James Rodríguez is the first player to score and assist on a goal in the first 15 minutes of a Copa América match since 2011
Key Match Events: Jhon Córdoba's header gives Colombia a 1-0 lead over Panama
Richard Ríos' strike from distance gives Colombia a 4-0 lead over Panama
James Rodríguez sinks a penalty kick giving Colombia a 2-0 lead vs. Panama
Luis Díaz scores a goal in 41' to extend Colombia's lead to 3-0 over Panama
Edgardo Farina's header went off the right post
Miguel Borja smacked in the penalty kick in 90'+4
